<https://github.com/sfischer13/python-prompt>`__ is tracked on GitHub.- `Bugs <https://github.com/sfischer13/python-prompt/issues>`__ can be reported on the issue tracker.Install-------|PyPI Python Versions| |PyPI Wheel|The package is available on`PyPI <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/prompt>`__::: $ pip install promptUse---An extensive `documentation <https://readthedocs.org/projects/prompt>`__is available.Some simple use cases::: import prompt email = prompt.email() # modify default prompt integer = prompt.integer(prompt="Please enter a number: ") # allow empty response real = prompt.real(empty=True) # require a two digit number using a regular expression regex = prompt.regex("^\d\d$")Contribute----------| Write a bug report or send a pull request.| Other `contributors
